roleset.name: put forth flowers,
roleset.note: BLOOM-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls entity_specific_cos-45.5, entity_specific_modes_being-47.2. (from bloom.01-v)
BLOOM-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bloom.01-n)
BLOOMING-N NOTES: Added as an alias (from bloom.01-n)

example.name: blooming-n
example.text: My initial stake in this blooming enterprise has grown tenfold, according to my conservative calculations.

example.name: bloom-v
example.text: John's dandelions are blooming in his yard.
